Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • NeuralNetwork

  • public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    framework for MLP-s (Multiple Layer Perceptron)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NeuralNetwork(int inputCount, int outputCount)
      network constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuralNetwork

        public NeuralNetwork(int inputCount,
                     int outputCount)
        network constructor. default network size is 2 (input and output layers), additional hidden layers can be added with methods
        Parameters:
        inputCount - number of inputs in the network
        outputCount - number of outputs in the network

    • Method Detail

      • getLayerCount

        public int getLayerCount()
        getter for network size
        Returns:
        number of layers in the network

      • getLayer

        public NeuralLayer getLayer(int index)
        getter for network layers
        Parameters:
        index - index of layer to be returned
        Returns:
        layer at index

      • addHiddenLayer

        public void addHiddenLayer(HiddenLayer l)
        adds a layer before the output layer, and updates the output layer to have appropriate amount of inputs
        Parameters:
        l - layer to be added layer neurons have to have appropriate inputs

      • addHiddenLayer

        public void addHiddenLayer(int neuronCount)
        adds a hidden layer with n neurons
        Parameters:
        neuronCount - number of neurons in the layer to be added

      • classify

        public double[] classify(double[] in)
        feeds data through the network and returns the output
        Parameters:
        in - input data has to have as many elements as there are inputs in the network
        Returns:
        returns the network output

      • train

        public void train(double[][] trainingData,
                  double[][] validationData,
                  double trainingRate,
                  int maxIterations)
        training algorithm for the MLP, implementing backpropogation. See any machine learning book for details ('Tom M. Mitchell - Machine learning' is decent)
        Parameters:
        trainingData - data to train the network on. format: rows are independent training examples columns are inputs/outputs, first the inputs, then the outputs
        validationData - data to validate the network. same form as the training data
        trainingRate - see any ML book

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Object string representation
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        returns a string with info about the network size
